column3: [EXPERIMENTAL] Perform valuation for a list of portfolios and/or portfolio groups

[EXPERIMENTAL] List all calenders in a specified scope
[EXPERIMENTAL] Get a calendar in its generic form

[EXPERIMENTAL] Get an entry identified by a metadataKey in the Access Metadata of a Legal Entity

[EXPERIMENTAL] Reconcile valuations performed on one or two sets of inline instruments using one or two configuration recipes.

[EXPERIMENTAL] Reconcile portfolio holdings with given tolerance
[EXPERIMENTAL] Get access metadata rules for a portfolio

[EXPERIMENTAL] Get the time series of a portfolio property
[EXPERIMENTAL] List the set of Configuration Recipes
[EXPERIMENTAL] Query the set of supported "addresses" that can be queried from the aggregation endpoint.
